titleStmt.title: A Pacquet of intelligence from New-Providence in the province of the Bahama Islands in America in two parts wherein the miserable state of the said province and people inhabiting the same for the space of four years under the tyranny of an indigent, debauch'd idiot and most pernicious villain named Cadwallader Jones is briefly demonstrated in letters of complaint against him to Coll. Phillip Ludwell, gouvernour of Carolina ...

A Pacquet of intelligence from New-Providence in the province of the Bahama Islands in America in two parts wherein the miserable state of the said province and people inhabiting the same for the space of four years under the tyranny of an indigent, debauch'd idiot and most pernicious villain named Cadwallader Jones is briefly demonstrated in letters of complaint against him to Coll.
